abstract: A purely electric version of the four-door hatchback, which will be offered in 2012 with a gasoline engine, will be made available in low quantities to American customers in 2013.
snippet: A purely electric version of the four-door hatchback, which will be offered in 2012 with a gasoline engine, will be made available in low quantities to American customers in 2013.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp

lead_paragraph: General Motors introduced the 2012 Chevrolet Spark subcompact four-door hatchback in Detroit on Wednesday. The news was swiftly upstaged, however, by the subsequent announcement that a purely electric version would be available to American customers in limited quantities in 2013.

headline.main: Chevrolet to Sell Purely Electric Spark Hatchback in U.S.
